mapper.select: select DISTINCT u.id,u.phone,u.nick_name,u.head_img_url from c_end_user_info u left join c_end_order o on u.open_id = o.open_id left join product_info p on o.product_id = p.id left join distribution_record d on o.product_id = d.product_id where (p.shop_id = (select id from shop_info where card_id = #{card}) or d.primary_shop_id = (select id from shop_info where card_id = #{card})) and o.status in(1,2) limit #{start}, #{num}

select DISTINCT u.id,u.phone,u.nick_name,u.head_img_url from c_end_user_info u left join c_end_order o on u.open_id = o.open_id left join product_info p on o.product_id = p.id left join distribution_record d on o.product_id = d.product_id where (p.shop_id = (select id from shop_info where card_id = #{card}) or d.primary_shop_id = (select id from shop_info where card_id = #{card})) and o.status in(1,2) and from_base64(u.nick_name) like concat('%',#{searchValue},'%') limit #{start}, #{num}

select DISTINCT o.standard_id,p.main_image,p.name,p.product_type,o.price,o.num,date_format(o.pay_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as pay_time from c_end_order o left join product_info p on o.product_id = p.id left join distribution_record d on o.product_id = d.product_id where (p.shop_id = (select id from shop_info where card_id = #{card}) or d.primary_shop_id = (select id from shop_info where card_id = #{card})) and o.status in(1,2) and o.open_id = (select open_id from c_end_user_info u where u.id = #{userId}) limit #{start}, #{num}
